Name: NOYO-!
About the game: Now, now, there was a girl and a biped cat at a certain place. The girl's name is 'Noyo', and the cat's name is 'Michel'. We was always peaceful and calm, but suddenly, everyone got crazy because of the 'DokuDenpa' from the smartphone! But Noyo was fine as she did not have a smartphone. 'I will help everyone! noyo-!' 'Meow!' Now, a girl and a biped cat have gone on an adventure. ...With you.
